API - cellDancer key applications¶

Import pandas, cellDancer, and plotting modules as:

import pandas as pd
import celldancer as cd
import celldancer.plotting as cdplt

After loaded the data (pd.read_csv), the prediction could be done by cd.velocity_estimation.velocity. The projection of velocity to embedding space could be calculated by cd.compute_cell_velocity.compute and visualized by cd.cell.scatter_cell. The pseudotime could be calculated by cd.pseudo_time.pseudo_time and visualized by cell.scatter_cell or gene.scatter_gene, the UMAP based one kinetic parameters could be calculated by cd.embedding_kinetic_para.embedding and visualized by cell.plot_kinetic_para.

Toolkit functions¶

Preprocessing¶

Functions

utilities.adata_to_raw_with_embed(adata[, ...])

Convert adata to raw data format with embedding info.

Velocity estimation and analysis¶

Functions

velocity_estimation.velocity(cell_type_u_s)

Velocity estimation for each cell.

compute_cell_velocity.compute(cellDancer_df)

Compute the cell velocity.

pseudo_time.pseudo_time(cellDancer_df, grid, dt)

Compute the gene-shared pseudotime based on the RNA cell velocities.

embedding_kinetic_para.embedding(...[, umap_n])

Calculate the UMAP based on kinetic parameter(s).

Plotting¶

Functions

gene.scatter_gene([ax, x, y, cellDancer_df, ...])

Plot the velocity (splice-unsplice) of a gene, or plot the parameter ('alpha', 'beta', 'gamma', 'splice', 'unsplice') in pseudotime, or customize the parameters in x-axis and y-axis of a gene.

cell.scatter_cell(ax, cellDancer_df[, ...])

Plot the the cell velocity; or plot the parameters ('alpha', 'beta', 'gamma', 'splice', 'unsplice', or 'pseudotime') of one gene in embedding space.

cell.plot_kinetic_para(ax, kinetic_para, ...)

Plot the UMAP calculated by kinetic parameter(s).

graph.graph(ax, cellDancer_df[, ...])

Graph visualization of selected cells reflecting their orders in pseudotime.
